subject: Payment Issue - Action Required 🚨
html:
🚨 Catalytic Computing
Payment Issue Notification

⚠️ Payment Failed

{{currency}} {{amount}}

We were unable to process your payment. Please update your payment method to continue your service.

What Happened?

Your payment of {{currency}} {{amount}} could not be processed. This could be due to:

  • Expired or invalid payment method
  • Insufficient funds
  • Bank security restrictions
  • Billing address mismatch

🚀 Keep Your Service Active

To avoid any interruption to your Catalytic Computing services, please update your payment method as soon as possible.

Update Payment Method →

💡 Need Help?

If you're having trouble with payment or have questions about your account:

  • 🏦 Contact your bank to ensure the card can be used for online payments
  • 💳 Try a different payment method (different card or bank account)
  • 🌍 Verify your billing address matches your card details
  • 📧 Reach out to our billing support team for assistance

⏰ Important Timeline

You have 7 days to update your payment method before your service may be temporarily suspended. Don't worry - your data and configurations will be safely preserved.

We understand payment issues can be frustrating. Our billing team is standing by to help resolve this quickly.

Thank you for your prompt attention!
The Catalytic Computing Billing Team

Catalytic Computing - Uninterrupted High-Performance Computing

Billing questions? Contact us at billing@catalyticcomputing.com

This is an automated billing notification.
